description: The primary objective is to produce a technical and functional program followed by the production of a gap analysis between current and future needs at the Harrow Ontario Research & Development Center greenhouse research complex.
full_summary:
### Harrow Greenhouse Needs Assessment
#### Request for Proposal

---

**Reference Number:** cb-649-77757973
**Solilcitation Number:** 01B46-2023-126

**Publication Date:** 2023-09-25
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-31T14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-12-01
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-31

The Government of Canada, through Agriculture & Agri-Food Canada, invites proposals from qualified firms to conduct a technical and functional program evaluation of the Harrow Ontario Research & Development Center greenhouse research complex, including a gap analysis between current and future needs. The selected firm will provide a comprehensive assessment of the greenhouse research complex, identifying areas for improvement and providing recommendations for future development.

**Project Requirements**

* Technical and functional program evaluation of the Harrow Ontario Research & Development Center greenhouse research complex
* Gap analysis between current and future needs of the greenhouse research complex
* Identification of areas for improvement and recommendations for future development

**Eligibility**

* The selection process is open to all eligible firms.
* Bidders must have relevant technical skills and experience.

**Evaluation Criteria**

* Technical merit
* Price

**Trade Agreements**

* This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Region**

* This project is open to bidders from anywhere in the world.

**Contact Information**

* Jean-François Lemay
* Email: jean-francois.lemay@agr.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 571-9706

**Submission Requirements**

* Bidders must submit their proposals electronically through the Canadabuys website.
* Proposals must be received by October 31, 2023, at 14:00:00 EDT.

**Attachment**

* The tender notice and RFP document can be downloaded from the Canadabuys website:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20429/rfp-2023-126_0.pdf

Note: You can modify this output as you see fit,
